name: Magician
description: A master of magical entertainment, you perform on stage for money.

exploits.name: Arrow Catch
exploits.description: You may catch one small missile fired at you as a reaction. You must be aware of the attack.

exploits.name: Card Trick
exploits.description: When gambling with cards, your dice pools explode. However, if you roll three ones, your cheating methods are exposed.

exploits.name: Escape Artist
exploits.description: Once per day you may automatically escape from any restraints or open a lock.

exploits.name: Levitation
exploits.description: You can levitate, moving at a speed of 20' per round vertically. This does not enable you to move horizontally.

exploits.name: Rabbit from a Hat
exploits.description: Three times per day, you may produce a small object from nowhere, up to a total value of 100 gc per day. Any item you produce in this way disappears after one minute.

exploits.name: Rope Trick
exploits.description: You cause a rope to levitate. You can climb the rope. At the top of the rope is a tiny pocket dimension with room for one person. You may pull the rope up after you. The dimension and effect lasts for up to one hour.

exploits.name: Rope Trick, Greater
exploits.description: As Rope Trick, but you can fit a number of people equal to your LOG attribute in the pocket dimension.

exploits.name: Vanishing Act
exploits.description: You can teleport short distances (5' per point of INT) to a location you can see.
